desc: 5 IN 1 LEASH is the dog leash that has it all, in one durable, practical and stylish product. It includes: heavy duty non-retractable leash, collapsible bowl made from silicone rubber that holds 250ml, hook to hold used waste bags, waste bag dispenser, water container that holds 350ml.

layout.text: Everything you need to walk your dog, in ONE.
5IN1LEASH includes: Leash, water bottle, collapsible bowl for water or food, waste bag dispenser and a hook for used waste bags.
